plugin.name: icepush
plugin.author: Stephane MALDINI
plugin.title: ICEpush integration
plugin.description:
\ ICEpush is a notification framework, it doesn't carry data unlike Cometd. However you can register callbacks such as page/fragment refresh and script invokation. By combining 1 Tag and 1 Call (from javascript/ser/ver side), you add a new dimension in your webware. You can push, join/leave channels from controllers/gsp and add support for services.
This plugin can be mixed with the coming ICEfaces 2 integration to allow collaborative application scaffolding and push capabilities for JSF2.
